residentialServices.title: AC Deep Cleaning Service
residentialServices.shortDesc: Complete deep cleaning and sanitization of indoor and outdoor units to improve cooling efficiency, airflow, and indoor air quality.
details: Complete indoor & outdoor unit deep cleaning

residentialServices.title: AC Fan Not Working
residentialServices.shortDesc: Professional repair for faulty fan motors or airflow issues to restore proper cooling and smooth AC operation.

residentialServices.title: AC Water Leakage Issue
residentialServices.shortDesc: Quick diagnosis and repair of drainage or pipe blockages to stop water leakage and protect your walls and interiors.

residentialServices.title: AC Anti Rust Services
residentialServices.shortDesc: Anti-rust coating and protection treatment to prevent corrosion and extend the life of your AC unit in all weather conditions.

residentialServices.title: AC Freezing Up / Ice Forming Issue
residentialServices.shortDesc: Fix freezing coils and ice buildup caused by gas imbalance, airflow restriction, or sensor issues for consistent cooling.

residentialServices.title: AC Less / No Cooling Issue
residentialServices.shortDesc: Complete system troubleshooting including gas level check, compressor inspection, and electronic repairs to restore full cooling.

residentialServices.title: AC Turning Off Issue
residentialServices.shortDesc: Repair for sudden shutdown problems caused by capacitor, wiring, or power supply faults to ensure uninterrupted operation.

residentialServices.title: AC Warm Air Issue
residentialServices.shortDesc: Fix warm airflow problems by checking refrigerant levels, piping insulation, and system performance for proper cooling.

residentialServices.title: AC Noise Issue
residentialServices.shortDesc: Reduce unusual noises by servicing fans, motors, and loose components for quieter and smoother AC performance.

residentialServices.title: AC Power On Issue
residentialServices.shortDesc: Quick repair of power failure or startup issues including PCB, wiring, and compressor checks to get your AC running instantly.

residentialServices.title: AC Routine Service
residentialServices.shortDesc: Regular maintenance service including cleaning, inspection, and performance checks to keep your AC efficient year-round.

residentialServices.title: AC Drainage Issue
residentialServices.shortDesc: Clearing clogged drain pipes and trays to prevent water overflow, leakage, and moisture-related damage.

residentialServices.title: AC Smell Issue
residentialServices.shortDesc: Deep sanitization and deodorizing treatment to remove bad odors, bacteria, and mold for fresh and healthy air.
